name: Crowne Plaza Hotel Boston - Natick

reviews.text: I just finished a Corporate Meeting Event at the Crowne Plaza and wanted to share my experiences. Since undergoing recent transformations, the hotel has established itself as a premier destination hotel in the heart of Natick, MA. From the top down, the staff could not have been more accommodating in meeting the requirements of my meeting.
reviews.title: Premiere property

reviews.text: The atmosphere of the hotel is fantastic, the energy that radiates when you walk in the front door strikes you immediately. One quick glance around and you will know you arrived at “The Verve”.
reviews.title: Good Hotel! Nice Location. Wow...Room Service Food Good!

reviews.text: The sleeping rooms have all been redone and are very comfortable; the modern décor is very appealing.
reviews.title: Renovations look really good

reviews.text: The food was fantastic and very creative, many compliments received from my group. Great job Chef!
reviews.title: Great place for an event or conference

reviews.text: The Violet Thorn bar is a must see, my group had a lot of fun unwinding after long days in meetings.
reviews.title: Absolutely the best Hotel that I have ever stayed at ...

reviews.text: What an exceptional property! We recently held our 35th reunion here and we can't say enough about this upscale hotel (we were in the beautiful "Constellation Room") as well as the excellent service provided by all staff members. Senior Catering Sales Manager, Sherry Michelson is a true pro. She worked with us for nearly a year until we had an event planned that was specifically tailored to our needs and our budget. We started our evening with cocktails in the lobby area of the hotel and then moved into our function room. We had looked at several properties to host our event, and this by far was the most unique, offering us the flexibilty to use several spacial areas of the hotel to mix things up a bit. I heard from several classmates who opted to get overnight rooms who were extremely pleased with their accommodations. The renovations are amazing! I would definitely recommend setting up a time to meet with Sherry Michelson to take a good look at this venue. We are certainly glad we did!
reviews.title: A Night to Remember...

reviews.text: P.S. Make sure you ask Sherry about the ice cream sundae bar. It was a HUGE hit!
reviews.title: Over thirty years of visiting...and will certianly be back!

reviews.text: My family and I have been staying at this particular Crowne Plaza for over 30 years. Our visit this Thanksgiving season introduced us to a new side of "Crowne". The hotel has been recently renovated, and is now "The Verve" Crowne Plaza, and much more "hip", relaxed, and welcoming! Our most recent experience was unique in that we had a personal issue that the hotel staff stepped up to the plate for, and all involved were amazing help! The general manager, Steve, handled us with top notch professionalism. Very attentive and caring. I would highly recommend this hotel to anyone traveling to the Natick/Boston/Framingham area. Rooms are clean and comfortable...with a contemporary flair. The bar, The Violet Thorn, is hip and also boasts a contemporary feel with roaring glass fireplace, unique lighting and cozy seating. Had several meals in "The Pantry", including a dinner party of 11 people, and all the service and food was, once again, top notch. Thank you Crowne...and especially Steve...for another wonderful experience! We WILL be back! ~ Vanessa, Houston TX
reviews.title: Top Notch Crowne Plaza Property

reviews.text: This is a top notch CP property. I have stayed at the Courtyard and Crowne Plaza on prior trips to the Natick area and this is certainly then nicest property.
reviews.title: City hotel hanging out in the burbs

reviews.text: The staff is great, great location, up to date rooms. Just all around a great experience each time I stay here.
reviews.title: Highly Recommended!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: My boyfriend and I stayed at this hotel during our mini road trip to Massachusetts for Labor Day Weekend in September. We loved this hotel. It has a very modern, hip and trendy look, from the lobby to the furnishings in the room. There was even a small flat screen TV in the bathroom!! The bed was very comfortable. To top it all off, the price was extremely reasonable. I have nothing negative to say about this hotel. Would certainly not hesitate to stay here again the next time I'm in the area.
reviews.title: Very comfortable stay!!

reviews.text: On a recent trip to Boston, we had the delightful experience of staying at the Crowne Plaza-Natick. An ideal location, 5 minutes from the Logan Express (a convenient an inexpensive way of traveling from the airport to Boston), and across the street from an amazing mall and restaurants! What more could one ask for besides excellent service and accommodations! You will find both of these at this outstanding hotel.
reviews.title: Remarkable Hotel!
The Verve
reviews.text: Due to Hurricane Sandy, my husband and I found ourselves in a terrible predicament. We had to change our airline reservations in order to get out of Boston a day earlier than planned. That change necessitated that we take a 6:00 AM flight to Raleigh, NC. Mr. Barry, who was at the front desk, tried very hard to find a taxi that could get us to the Logan Express station which was only 5 minutes from the Crowne Plaza at 4:00 AM. However, he discovered taxis did not run that early and only limousines, which would go directly to the airport , would be willing to come out at that hour - for a charge of well over $100.00! At that point, Mr. Barry graciously said that he thought he had a solution to our problem, since we had already changed our flight and could not go at any other time. He offered to take us to the nearby Station if the other gentleman on duty at 4:00 AM would not mind covering for him for 10 minutes. Both agreed and Mr. Barry was ready at 4:00 AM on a Sunday morning as planned! What a relief because we did not know what we would do if he hadn't been so kind to make this offer.
With employees who emulate Mr. Barry in their concern for the welfare and comfort of their guests, a stay at this remarkable hotel will long be remembered!
reviews.title: Pleasant Surprise

reviews.text: Went to see the band John Cafferty and the Beaver Brown Band - the venue was intimate yet, had enough room to dance and see the band up close! Big bar, nice cafe to grab something to eat. Pleasant staff. Really enjoyed the atmosphere. Would recommend - will go back to see other bands!
reviews.title: Nice little hotel in the heart of shopping

reviews.text: Location is about 30 mins drive from centre of Boston, but is directly opposite the major shopping mall. As a result considerably cheaper, and very good value. I guess for this reason, it was not very full; we were the only people eating breakfast However, very clean,good service, and the comfiest bed I have slept in for a very long time.
reviews.title: Very comfortable, good value, check location

reviews.text: The Verve was a fantastic place to host our daughter's Bat Mitzvah reception. Our out-of-town guests were able to stay at the beautiful hotel and have easy access to both the terrific food at the Verve as well as all the restaurants nearby on Route 9 and in the Natick Collections. The Verve and Sherry, our event planner, were very accommodating. Sherry was very knowledgeable, helpful and always had a smile on her face. They helped guide us through the process of planning the affair down to every detail. The newly renovated lobby and ballrooms were modern, chic and whimsical, a perfect for setting to get everyone in the mood to have fun. The food was delicious and the service wonderful. The room was large enough to accommodate tons of kids and adults dancing, a DJ, a photo booth, a kids buffet / dessert and candy bar and a giant balloon Menorah. We all had a blast. We also hosted a Sunday brunch for our out-of-town guests the next day. The private room, food and service was outstanding. We highly recommend The Verve for any type of occasion.
reviews.title: Bat Mitzvah Reception

reviews.text: I had two Crowne Plaza experiences one year apart.
reviews.title: More than a renovation: from rotten to rockin'!

reviews.text: In November of 2011, I attended my husband's 20th reunion in a tired ballroom with no ambiance, and inedible looking pasta served in warmer troughs.
reviews.title: Trendy hotel located near prime shopping

reviews.text: For the same price, I came back again in 2012 for my own reunion, which I had helped to plan. The Verve is LITERALLY a new hotel. The colors pop, the room looked amazing, and the passed appetizers that we chose instead of a buffet were trendy, hot, and delicious. For dessert we had a fantastic sundae bar, and the bar served all sorts of innovative cocktails. We were blown away! Sheri and Lillian did a fantastic job coordinating our event, and worked with us closely as our numbers of attendees fluctuated. People who arranged to stay over at the hotel loved the newly renovated rooms as well, and they have a quiet floor for people like me who like to sleep without any hallway noise.
reviews.title: Hip Boutique Hotel- Just Outside of Boston- Hope to Return!

description: Welcome to the finest hotel in MetroWest Boston, The Verve Crowne Plaza Hotel Boston-Natick. The hotel offers luxurious, comfortable surroundings with attentive, courteous service. All guestrooms offer complimentary high-speed Internet and our club floor features exceptional accommodations and personalized services for the more discerning guest. For those who are traveling from Logan Airport, the Logan Express Framingham bus service stop is conveniently located a mile away from the hotel. Strategically located 17 miles west of Boston, this hotel is conveniently located near visitor attractions such as The Freedom Trail, Faneuil Hall, Quincy Market, USS Constitution, Back Bay, and the North End and baseball can be enjoyed at the famous Fenway Park, home of the Boston Red Sox. The Verve Crowne Plaza is located within one mile of five shopping malls, a wide variety of restaurants and two movie cinema complexes. The popular Natick Collection is located across the street from The Verve Crowne Plaza and has expanded to include Massachusetts' first-ever Nordstrom, Neiman Marcus and a hundred specialty stores, luxury boutiques and dining options. When making your traveling plans to the Boston-Natick area, consider The Verve Crowne Plaza and check out our room packages such as our Boston Weekend Package, our Natick Collection Shopping Package.
